stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the behavior of lines 2 and 3 in the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

Â 

int[] scores = {85, 92, 78, 90, 88};
scores[1] *= 2;            // Line 2
scores[2] += 10;           // Line 3

choicesHtml: Line 2 doubles the first element in the array and line 3 adds 10 to the second element.
Line 2 doubles the second element in the array and line 3 adds 10 to the third element.
Line 2 doubles the third element in the array and line 3 adds 10 to the fourth element.
Lines 2 and 3 do not change the contents of the array.
